oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Massacre Pamphlet
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet describing the massacre of Unionists at Limestone Cove (Unicoi County, Tenn.) in November 1863 by the Confederate Witcher’s Cavalry .
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pamphlets; Massacres; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Calvin M. McClung Special Materials Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
